name: A Janitor's Nightmare (HeheheHoho)
description:
(I recommend using 80% zoom for the best experience)

Made for the BenBonk Game Jam

For the theme, you have to keep yourself from anything green!

You are a janitor, but some sort of deadly ink cart has interrupted your shift! You didn't want to get fired, so continue your job, dodging the ink.

I had to make this game with 4 colous! Please subscribe: HeheheHoho - YouTube
